snippet.title: The Devil Is In The Details Teaser Trailer Play Demo on Steam
snippet.description:
Play the DEMO:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2790790/The_Devil_is_in_the_Details/

CAN YOU SURVIVE THE DEVIL'S GAME?

In The Devil is in the Details, a first-person horror experience, you find yourself trapped in a hellish mansion. Each step forward is a gamble in this ever-changing nightmare, where no two playthroughs are alike. Explore and investigate your surroundings and try to beat the devil at his own game, by placing talismans on haunted objects, while trying to survive against the many deadly traps and foes that lurk in the shadows, as well as having to deal with the pranks demons and the devil throw at you.
